3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Cozy Red Cabin with Guest House! Located within 5 minutes of restaurants and shopping. Desirable area of Big Bear City nestled in a quaint neighborhood just minutes away from Ski Slopes, the Lake, and Big Bear Valley Sportman's Club. Main house has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, vaulted ceilings and huge fireplace. Plenty of bookshelves for those who love to read. Guest house is a spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit. Spa is situated between both cabins and offers lots of privacy for those relaxing evenings. Large flat usable land completely fenced with alley access! Perfect yard for pets or for additional parking; including RV Parking Large storage shed for all your snow gear and or gardening tools. This home has multi-uses and is great for full-time living, vacation home, or Airbnb! Sleeps up to 12-15 people. Must see to truly appreciate!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Newport Heights traditional 3-bedroom 2.5-bath plus spacious office with separate outdoor entrance. This unique oversized lot is set back 100' feet off Broad St. and extremely private. The home is very bright and spacious with oversized windows and has recently been updated. New roof in 22', Lennox high efficiency dual zoned heat/air conditioning, LED lighting, tankless water heater, refinished oak floors, and many other upgrades. Chef's kitchen with built in Sub-Zero, Dacor appliances, and large dining island with extra thick white Calacatta marble throughout. Master bedroom has 12ft. high ceilings with en suite bathroom, his and her sinks, separate soaking tub, walk in closet, and its own ocean facing balcony. The backyard is truly an oasis with its lush tropical landscaping and pool lined with gardenia flowers makes you feel like you're visiting the Hawaiian islands. The real 'Wow Factor' with this beautiful house is the way that the twin sets of french doors in both the front and the back open up the entire main level giving the house a great indoor/outdoor flow making for true Southern California living. Come and see for yourself...
Confidential Remarks: The owner of the home is also the listing agent. Listing agent/owner do not represent or guarantee square footage, bedroom/bathroom count, lot size or lot dimensions, or un-permitted space. It is the buyers sole responsibility to verify all information.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This unique ranch-style home from the 1950s, situated in the captivating Mountain View area, boasts an array of eccentric details. Conveniently located less than half a mile away from Cal Poly San Luis Obispo and the upper Monterey District, this home offers easy access to downtown amenities. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by an abundance of natural light streaming through the large windows. With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living spaces, and multiple built-in desks for crafting or work, this home provides ample space for comfortable living. Additionally, the property includes a 21 x 14 studio in the back, ideal for accommodating guests or serving as student housing. The spacious backyard features a generous deck with mountain viewâ€™s and offers the perfect opportunity to create a garden, complete with a persimmon, lemon, and apple tree already in place.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A thoughtfully crafted family home in Newport Heights. This timeless farmhouse exemplifies the attention to detail, quality, and craftsmanship that local design-build firm Clayton Builders is known for. Step inside the charming, open architecture with family room, dining room and kitchen accessing the primary suite as well as three secondary bedrooms and three additional baths. This unique single story home is appointed with custom finishes throughout including: masonry fireplace, European white-oak flooring, detailed millwork & joinery, Italian marble countertops, Zellige tile, as well as a collection of curated lighting and plumbing fixtures. Terraced outdoor-living space framing the home in Sonoma-style landscaping compliments the exterior. A must see for the discerning buyer!
Confidential Remarks: All showings and questions please call or text Sina Oveissi 949-421-7050. Brokers and Agents, Seller and Sellers Agent & Broker do not guarantee the accuracy in the MLS. Buyer is advised to verify all accuracy of information through inspections and doing their own due diligence. All offers must have recent Pre approval, FICO, and recent Proof of funds with your offer. Please submit all offers to Sina Oveissi at: soveissi.pointere@gmail.com. Seller will not accept blind offers. Seller may not counter all offers so please submit your buyers HIGHEST & BEST offer.
Directions to Property: Holmwood Dr / Beacon St

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this timeless single-level home in Newport Beach! Perfectly nestled amongst mature trees on a private corner lot, this classic home exudes warmth and charm. The manicured front yard greets you with a trickling fountain and boxwood hedges. This home welcomes you through a charming Dutch Door with the main living space boasting a beautiful stone fireplace, rich wood floors, and a private office. Enjoy the remodeled gourmet kitchen that features skylights, crisp white cabinets, granite counters, and ample storage with Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances. Gatherings around the dining table with a glowing fire conjure a cozy evening perfect for hosting family and friends. The primary suite with views to the backyard has a spa-like bathroom with stone countertops, a soaking tub, a separate shower, and a generous walk-in closet. On the other side of the home are two more bedrooms both with access to a private deck and yard. The second bathroom offers a tub and shower and is directly across from the laundry room. Step out of the French doors that open to the large private backyard and enjoy a fountain, grass, gardens, and stone pathways creating a peaceful, private, and secluded feelin

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tucked at the end of a great Cul-de-Sac, this Newport Heights gem is a rare opportunity not to be missed! Located in the exclusive enclave of Newport Heights, this home and setting is highly desired. An easy stroll to top-rated schools, 17th St shops and restaurants, and close proximity to the beaches and the Back Bay, enjoy tranquil relaxation in this tight-knit, peaceful neighborhood. The interior of this home is comfortable and inviting, with a light and bright floor plan featuring three upstairs bedrooms and one downstairs, as well as an open kitchen, dining and living room ideal for entertaining. Cathedral ceilings, skylights and floor-to-ceiling windows soar above a dramatic sunroom, creating an amazing additional living space with effortless indoor-outdoor flow. The backyard includes a spacious, tiled patio and back lawn. Since its construction in 1962, the property has been lovingly cared-for and updated over time, maintaining its classic character, while also presenting the opportunity to reimagine and upgrade in your own personal style. Parking is generously proportioned as well, with a large driveway, extended 3-car garage and ample storage. All in an incredible location
Directions to Property: Irvine Blvd at 15th street.
